channel.title: Summoning Combat Level
channel.description: On my rsps summoning doesn't effect the combat level. I want to know how to make it where my combat level can be 138 instead of 126.

item.title: Summoning Combat Level
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Wrong skill id for summoning. Summoning is the 24th skill, making the skill id 23.

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning Combat Level
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

if you are using pi go in Client.java and remplace the function public int getCombatLevel() by this one:

[code]public int getCombatLevel() {
int mag = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
int ran = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);
int attstr = (int) ((double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));
if (ran > attstr) {
combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)

  • ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125)
    + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875));
    } else if (mag > attstr) {
    combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
    + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
    + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875)
  • ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
    } else {
    combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
    + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
    + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
    + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325)
    + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
    }
    return combatLevel;
    }[/code]

Read full topic
